reference.title: ERXADDR_EL1, Selected Error Record Address Register, EL1
reference.shortdesc: Register ERXADDR_EL1 accesses the ERR<n>ADDR address register for the error record selected by ERRSELR_EL1.SEL.

section.p: If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==0, then ERXADDR_EL1 accesses the ERR0ADDR register of the core error record. See ERR0ADDR, Error Record Address RegisterThe ERR0ADDR stores the address that is associated to an error that is recorded..
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==1, then ERXADDR_EL1 accesses the ERR1ADDR register of the DSU error record. See the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
